It's written in a language I don't understand.
With the Book of Cyphers, I can understand
this book. It seems to be some sort of miner's
diary. Most of it isn't legible, but there
are a few passages of interest:
from the mines. Cryslon isn't feeling so good
though. I told him to take a break, but he's
"The molten flow device seems to be working
now. The trouble is, when it's activated, it
will flood the mines with lava, blocking
the way into the treasury. It's a good thing
that some of us are able to fly over it."
"Cryslon died last night. Happened when I was
away gathering supplies. As per his request,
his ashes were fused into his headstone. They
must not have known that he was carrying the
treasury key. Oh well, most of the gear we
need is brought in from outside. Best to let
The key must be inside the headstone...
